title: Nicole Richie flaunts a makeup free glow as she hosts chat conversation with author Sasha Sagan
text:
Nicole Richie looked chic as she hosted a conversation with author Sarah Sagan, the daughter of famous astronomer Carl Sagan, Monday.

The fashion designer/reality star was there to celebrate Sagan's new book For Small Creatures Such As We during the event at West Hollywood's Book Soup.

Richie, the daughter of singer/songwriter Lionel Richie, looked elegant in a paisley dress and faux fur coat at the talk.

Chat host: Nicole Richie looked elegant as she hosted a chat with author Sarah Sagan on Monday night

Her gold and black dress was elegant as it cascaded toward the ground with two flounces at the bottom.

The House Of Harlow, 38, designer slung a rich brown coat with faux fur trimming over her shoulders.

Keeping effortless, Nicole went makeup free to flaunt her glowing skin.

Author: The fashion designer/reality star was there to celebrate Sagan's new book For Small Creatures Such As We during the event at West Hollywood's Book Soup

You glow girl: Keeping effortless, Nicole went makeup free to flaunt her glowing skin

She continued the understated trend by keeping her hair in natural curls.

Sagan matched Nicole's colors wearing a frock with gold, brown and champagne blooms scattered upon it.

The celebrity and author were there to talk about Sagan's forthcoming book, which explores science, faith and family.

Higher powers: The celebrity and author were there to talk about Sagan's forthcoming book, which explores science, faith and family

Part memory, part guidebook, For Small Creatures Such As We is a 'a luminous exploration of Earth’s marvels that require no faith in order to be believed.'

The book pays homage to Sasha's late father Carl, who was a pioneer in the field of astronomy, as well as her mother, writer/producer Ann Druyan as Sasha explores science and spirituality in relation to her role as a mother.

For Small Creatures Such As We is out via Pengiun Books now.
